title: 浸大：推遲學期結束日期同考試日期

replies.msg:
Make-Up Classes and Extension of the Semester

Semester 2 will be extended for two weeks. After face-to-face classes can resume, make-up classes will be arranged to cover for content as well as studio and laboratory sessions that cannot be delivered by other means. Such make-up classes will be arranged during the two-week extension, and/or through classes on weekends as well as other remedial means such as intensive learning.

The adjustments to the academic calendar are as follows:

1.
The last day of classes will be 9 May 2020 (original date: 25 April). Course instructors will arrange make-up classes as soon as classes can resume including during the two-week extension;

2.
Examinations for Semester 2 will take place from 14–28 May 2020 (original period 4–18 May);

3.
It is expected that the graduation lists may be approved on 30 June 2020 by Senate (a few days later than the original approval date).
